recipes.title: Menemen (Turkish Scrambled Eggs)
recipes.description: A quick Turkish breakfast made with tomatoes, peppers, and eggs.

instructions.text: Chop peppers and sauté in olive oil for 2–3 minutes.
Add grated or diced tomatoes and cook until slightly reduced.
Crack in eggs, gently stir, and cook to your preferred doneness. Season and serve.

recipes.title: Red Lentil Soup (Mercimek Çorbası)
recipes.description: A comforting Turkish soup made with red lentils and aromatics.

instructions.text: Rinse lentils. Dice onion, carrot (and potato if using).
Sauté onion in olive oil (and butter) for 3 minutes, add tomato paste and cook 1 minute.
Add vegetables, lentils, water, salt, cumin. Simmer 20–25 minutes until soft.
Blend until smooth. Adjust thickness with water if needed and serve.

recipes.title: Ezogelin Soup
recipes.description: A classic Turkish soup with red lentils, bulgur, rice, and spices.

instructions.text: Sauté chopped onion in olive oil for 3–4 minutes; add minced garlic and tomato paste for 1 minute.
Add lentils, bulgur, rice, water, and salt. Simmer 25–30 minutes.
Blend lightly (optional), then add dried mint and paprika. Rest 5 minutes and serve.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Çiğ Köfte (No Meat)
recipes.description: Spicy bulgur patties kneaded with isot-style seasoning and served in lettuce wraps.

instructions.text: Soak fine bulgur with hot water for 10 minutes until softened.
Grate onion (or mince very finely). Add tomato paste, pepper paste, spices, salt; knead 10–15 minutes.
Knead in pomegranate molasses and olive oil. Fold in chopped parsley and lemon juice.
Shape into finger patties. Serve with lettuce, lemon, and optional lavash.

recipes.title: Haydari (Garlic Yogurt Dip)
recipes.description: Thick strained yogurt dip with garlic, herbs, and olive oil.

instructions.text: Crush garlic with salt into a paste.
Mix strained yogurt with garlic, mint, and dill (if using).
Drizzle olive oil on top. Chill 10 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: İmam Bayıldı (Stuffed Eggplant in Olive Oil)
recipes.description: Eggplants stuffed with onions, tomatoes, and garlic, braised in olive oil.

instructions.text: Score eggplants lengthwise, salt lightly, and rest 10 minutes. Pat dry.
Sauté sliced onions in olive oil until soft. Add garlic and diced tomatoes; cook 8–10 minutes. Season (optional sugar).
Pan-sear eggplants briefly to soften (or bake 10 minutes). Open the slit and stuff with the onion-tomato filling.
Add a splash of water to the pan, cover, and simmer 30–35 minutes until eggplants are tender.

recipes.title: Karnıyarık (Stuffed Eggplant with Ground Beef)
recipes.description: Eggplants stuffed with a savory ground beef filling and baked in tomato sauce.

instructions.text: Slit eggplants, salt, rest 10 minutes, then pan-sear or bake to soften.
Sauté onion and peppers in olive oil. Add ground beef; cook until browned. Stir in tomato paste, diced tomatoes, garlic, salt, pepper.
Stuff eggplants with filling. Add a simple sauce (water + grated tomato + pinch of salt) to the tray.
Bake at 190°C for 25–30 minutes. Food safety: ground beef should reach ~71°C internally.

recipes.title: Kuru Fasulye (Turkish White Bean Stew)
recipes.description: Slow-simmered white beans in a tomato-pepper base, often served with rice.

instructions.text: Soak beans overnight (or quick-soak: boil 3 minutes, rest 1 hour). Drain.
Sauté chopped onion in butter/olive oil. Add tomato paste (and pepper paste) and cook 1 minute.
Add beans and water. Simmer 60–75 minutes until tender. Salt near the end. Rest 10 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Turkish Rice Pilaf (Şehriyeli Pilav)
recipes.description: Fluffy rice pilaf with toasted vermicelli, a staple Turkish side dish.

instructions.text: Rinse rice until water runs clearer; soak 10 minutes, drain.
Toast vermicelli in butter until golden. Add rice and sauté 2 minutes.
Add water and salt. Bring to a boil, cover, cook on low 12 minutes, then rest 10 minutes off heat.

recipes.title: Kısır (Turkish Bulgur Salad)
recipes.description: A bright bulgur salad with tomato paste, herbs, and pomegranate molasses.

instructions.text: Soak bulgur with hot water for 10 minutes until fluffy.
Mix in tomato paste (and pepper paste), pomegranate molasses, olive oil, lemon juice, and salt.
Fold in finely chopped herbs, green onions, and optional cucumber. Rest 5 minutes, then serve.

recipes.title: Yayla Soup (Yogurt Soup with Rice)
recipes.description: A comforting Turkish yogurt soup with rice and mint.

instructions.text: Simmer rice in water until very soft, 15–18 minutes.
Whisk yogurt, egg yolk, and flour. Temper with a ladle of hot soup, then pour back in.
Simmer gently 5 minutes (do not boil hard). Season with salt.
Melt butter, bloom dried mint, and drizzle on top.

recipes.title: Tarhana Soup
recipes.description: Tangy and hearty Turkish tarhana soup, finished with butter and spices.

instructions.text: Dissolve tarhana in a little cold water to prevent lumps.
Add remaining water, bring to a gentle boil while stirring, simmer 10–12 minutes.
Melt butter, add paprika (optional), and stir into soup. Season and serve.

recipes.title: Shepherd’s Salad (Çoban Salatası)
recipes.description: A fresh chopped salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, peppers, and lemon-olive oil dressing.

instructions.text: Chop vegetables into small, even pieces; finely chop parsley.
Dress with lemon juice, olive oil, and salt. Toss and rest 5 minutes.

recipes.title: Gavurdağı Salad
recipes.description: A nutty, tangy Turkish salad with walnuts, pomegranate molasses, and sumac.

instructions.text: Dice tomato, cucumber, and onion very small. Chop walnuts.
Mix dressing: pomegranate molasses, olive oil, sumac, salt. Toss and serve.

recipes.title: Turkish Potato Salad (Patates Salatası)
recipes.description: A simple potato salad with olive oil, lemon, herbs, and optional pickles.

instructions.text: Boil potatoes until tender, cool slightly, peel, and cube.
Mix with chopped herbs and scallions. Add lemon juice, olive oil, salt.
Fold in chopped pickles if using. Chill 15 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Zucchini Fritters (Mücver)
recipes.description: Crispy zucchini fritters with herbs and feta, pan-fried until golden.

instructions.text: Grate zucchini, salt lightly, squeeze out excess water well.
Mix with eggs, flour, herbs, and optional feta. Adjust thickness with 1 more spoon of flour if too wet.
Pan-fry spoonfuls in hot oil 2–3 minutes per side until golden.

recipes.title: Sigara Böreği (Crispy Cheese Rolls)
recipes.description: Thin pastry rolls filled with cheese and herbs, fried until crisp.

instructions.text: Mix crumbled feta with chopped parsley.
Cut yufka into triangles, place filling, roll tightly; seal edge with a little water.
Fry in hot oil until golden. Drain on paper towels and serve.

recipes.title: Lentil Patties (Mercimek Köftesi)
recipes.description: Vegan lentil-bulgur patties with herbs and spices—perfect for meze platters.

instructions.text: Boil lentils with 3 cups water until very soft and almost dry.
Stir in bulgur, cover, rest 10 minutes to swell.
Sauté onion in olive oil; add pastes and spices. Mix into lentil-bulgur base.
Fold in chopped herbs and lemon juice. Shape into patties.

recipes.title: Stuffed Peppers (Biber Dolması)
recipes.description: Bell peppers stuffed with rice, herbs, and spices, simmered in tomato sauce.

instructions.text: Cut tops off peppers, remove seeds. Rinse rice.
Sauté chopped onions in olive oil. Add rice, grated tomato, paste, spices, salt; cook 3 minutes.
Stuff peppers loosely (rice expands). Place in pot, add water, cover.
Simmer 40–45 minutes on low until rice is tender.

recipes.title: Stuffed Vine Leaves (Yaprak Sarma)
recipes.description: Tender vine leaves rolled with herbed rice, gently simmered with olive oil and lemon.

instructions.text: If leaves are brined, rinse well. If fresh, blanch briefly.
Sauté onions in olive oil; add rice, spices, salt (and optional nuts/currants). Cook 3 minutes, cool slightly.
Roll small portions tightly. Line pot, arrange rolls seam-side down.
Add water and lemon slices, cover with a plate, simmer 45–50 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Sauté (Tavuk Sote)
recipes.description: Quick chicken sauté with peppers and tomatoes, finished in its own juices.

instructions.text: Sauté onions in olive oil 2 minutes; add diced chicken and cook until color changes.
Add peppers, cook 3 minutes; add tomatoes and spices.
Cover and simmer 10–12 minutes. Food safety: chicken should reach ~74°C internally.

recipes.title: Turkish Meatballs (Izgara Köfte)
recipes.description: Juicy grilled-style Turkish meatballs seasoned with onion, spices, and breadcrumbs.

instructions.text: Grate onion (squeeze excess juice), mix with beef, spices, crumbs, and optional egg. Knead 5 minutes.
Shape into patties; rest 10 minutes.
Pan-sear or grill 3–4 minutes per side. Food safety: ground beef should reach ~71°C internally.

recipes.title: Chickpea Stew (Nohut Yemeği)
recipes.description: Chickpeas simmered in a tomato base—an everyday Turkish home-cooking staple.

instructions.text: Soak chickpeas overnight, drain. (Or use pressure cooker to shorten time.)
Sauté onion in olive oil; add tomato paste, cook 1 minute.
Add chickpeas and water, simmer 60–70 minutes until tender. Salt near the end.

recipes.title: Green Beans in Olive Oil (Zeytinyağlı Taze Fasulye)
recipes.description: Tender green beans braised with tomatoes, onions, and olive oil.

instructions.text: Trim beans. Sauté onion (and optional garlic) in olive oil 4 minutes.
Add chopped tomatoes, salt, optional sugar; cook 5 minutes.
Add beans and water; cover and simmer 40–45 minutes. Serve warm or cold.

recipes.title: Bulgur Pilaf (Bulgur Pilavı)
recipes.description: A staple bulgur pilaf with tomatoes and peppers—fast and filling.

instructions.text: Sauté onion (and pepper) in olive oil; stir in tomato paste for 1 minute.
Add bulgur, toss 1 minute. Add water and salt.
Bring to boil, cover, simmer 12–15 minutes, rest 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Cacık (Turkish Yogurt-Cucumber Dip)
recipes.description: Cool yogurt with cucumber, garlic, mint, and olive oil—served as a dip or soup.

instructions.text: Grate or dice cucumber; crush garlic with salt (optional).
Mix yogurt with cucumber, mint, and optional water for desired consistency.
Finish with optional olive oil drizzle. Chill and serve.

recipes.title: Menemen with Sucuk
recipes.description: Menemen enriched with spicy Turkish sausage for extra flavor.

instructions.text: Slice sucuk and render in a pan 2 minutes (no extra oil needed).
Add peppers, sauté 2 minutes; add tomatoes, cook until slightly reduced.
Add eggs and cook to preference. Food safety: cook eggs until set if serving to risk groups.

recipes.title: Revani (Semolina Cake in Syrup)
recipes.description: A classic syrup-soaked semolina cake, light and fragrant.

instructions.text: Whisk eggs and sugar until pale. Mix in yogurt.
Fold in semolina, flour, baking powder, and optional lemon zest.
Bake at 180°C for ~30 minutes until golden.
Pour cool syrup over warm cake (or warm syrup over cool cake). Rest 1 hour before slicing.

recipes.title: Rice Pudding (Sütlaç)
recipes.description: Creamy Turkish rice pudding, gently simmered and served chilled.

instructions.text: Simmer rice in water until very soft and nearly absorbed.
Add milk, simmer gently 25–30 minutes, stirring often.
Add sugar and optional vanilla; simmer 5 minutes more. Chill before serving.

recipes.title: Ayran (Yogurt Drink)
recipes.description: A refreshing salty yogurt drink—perfect with kebabs and börek.

instructions.text: Whisk yogurt, water, and salt until frothy (or blend 15 seconds).
Taste and adjust salt/water. Serve cold.

recipes.title: Tomato Soup (Domates Çorbası)
recipes.description: A smooth Turkish-style tomato soup, often served with cheese and croutons.

instructions.text: Grate or blend tomatoes. Cook butter + olive oil with flour for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes, stir 2 minutes, then add water. Simmer 15–18 minutes.
Blend smooth. Add optional milk for creaminess, season with salt, warm through.

recipes.title: Piyaz (Turkish White Bean Salad)
recipes.description: A classic bean salad with onion, parsley, and a tangy dressing.

instructions.text: Slice onion thinly, rinse and drain (optional for milder taste).
Mix beans with onion and chopped parsley.
Dress with lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and optional sumac.

recipes.title: Acılı Ezme (Spicy Tomato-Pepper Mezze)
recipes.description: A punchy Turkish mezze made with tomatoes, peppers, and herbs.

instructions.text: Finely mince tomatoes, pepper, onion, and parsley (knife or processor pulsed).
Mix in pepper paste, olive oil, salt, and optional pomegranate molasses and chili flakes.
Rest 10 minutes for flavors to meld, then serve.

recipes.title: Şakşuka (Eggplant & Tomato Mezze)
recipes.description: Fried eggplant and zucchini tossed in a garlicky tomato sauce.

instructions.text: Cube eggplant (and optional zucchini). Salt and rest 10 minutes, pat dry.
Pan-fry in olive oil until browned and tender; set aside.
Cook grated tomatoes with minced garlic and salt 10–12 minutes. Toss vegetables in sauce.

recipes.title: Leeks in Olive Oil (Zeytinyağlı Pırasa)
recipes.description: A classic olive-oil braise with leeks and carrots, served at room temperature.

instructions.text: Slice leeks; cut carrots into half-moons.
Add olive oil to pot, layer leeks and carrots. Add salt, optional sugar, water.
Simmer covered 25–30 minutes. Add optional rice in last 15 minutes.
Finish with lemon juice. Cool and serve at room temperature.

recipes.title: Oven Roasted Chicken Drumsticks (Fırın Baget)
recipes.description: Simple roasted drumsticks with Turkish spices—crispy edges, juicy inside.

instructions.text: Coat drumsticks with olive oil, spices, salt and pepper.
Bake at 200°C for 35–40 minutes, turning once.
Food safety: chicken should reach ~74°C internal temperature.

recipes.title: Roasted Eggplant Salad (Köz Patlıcan Salatası)
recipes.description: Smoky roasted eggplant mixed with garlic, lemon, and olive oil.

instructions.text: Roast eggplants over flame or at 220°C until collapsed and charred.
Peel, chop, and drain excess liquid.
Mix with crushed garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, and salt.

recipes.title: Cheese Gözleme (Peynirli Gözleme)
recipes.description: Thin flatbread stuffed with cheese and herbs, cooked on a hot pan.

instructions.text: Mix crumbled feta with chopped parsley.
Fill yufka, fold into half-moon, press edges.
Cook on a hot dry pan 2–3 minutes per side; brush with optional butter.

recipes.title: Bazlama (Turkish Pan Flatbread)
recipes.description: Soft, fluffy Turkish flatbread cooked on a pan—great for breakfast and sandwiches.

instructions.text: Mix flour, yeast, salt. Add water and knead 8–10 minutes.
Cover and let rise 45–60 minutes until doubled.
Divide, shape rounds, rest 10 minutes. Cook on hot pan 2–3 minutes per side.

recipes.title: Semolina Halva (İrmik Helvası)
recipes.description: Buttery semolina halva cooked with milk-water syrup, served warm.

instructions.text: Warm milk + water + sugar until sugar dissolves (do not boil hard).
Toast semolina in butter (and optional pine nuts) until fragrant and slightly darker.
Carefully add warm syrup, stir, cover, rest 10 minutes. Fluff and serve.

recipes.title: Fava (Broad Bean Purée)
recipes.description: Aegean-style fava purée served chilled with olive oil and dill.

instructions.text: Simmer fava beans with onion, water, salt until very soft (30–35 minutes).
Blend with olive oil until smooth. Pour into a dish and chill until set.
Serve with olive oil, optional dill, and optional lemon juice.

recipes.title: Simit-Style Sesame Bread Rings (Ev Usulü)
recipes.description: Home-style sesame rings inspired by Turkish simit.

instructions.text: Knead flour, yeast, salt with water 8–10 minutes. Rise 45 minutes.
Shape rings. Mix molasses with water_for_dip, dip rings, then coat in sesame.
Bake at 200°C for 18–20 minutes until deep golden.

recipes.title: Fried Cauliflower (Karnabahar Kızartması)
recipes.description: Crispy cauliflower florets coated in a simple batter, served with yogurt sauce.

instructions.text: Break cauliflower into florets, blanch 4–5 minutes, drain well.
Mix eggs, flour, salt (and optional pepper) to make a thick batter.
Coat florets and fry until golden. Drain and serve.

recipes.title: Turkish Pancake (Akıtma / Krep)
recipes.description: Thin Turkish-style pancakes, great with cheese, honey, or jam.

instructions.text: Whisk eggs, milk, flour, and salt into a smooth batter. Rest 5 minutes.
Cook thin pancakes on a hot lightly greased pan, ~1 minute per side.

recipes.title: Spiced Oven Potatoes (Baharatlı Fırın Patates)
recipes.description: Crispy roasted potato wedges with Turkish spices.

instructions.text: Cut potatoes into wedges. Toss with olive oil, spices, and salt.
Bake at 200°C for 30–35 minutes, turning once, until crisp and browned.

recipes.title: Tomato Red Lentil Soup (Domatesli Mercimek Çorbası)
recipes.description: A tomato-forward red lentil soup with cumin and a smooth finish.

instructions.text: Sauté chopped onion in olive oil for 3 minutes. Add tomato paste and cook 1 minute.
Add rinsed lentils, water, salt, and cumin. Simmer 20–25 minutes until soft.
Blend smooth. Adjust thickness with water if needed.

recipes.title: Yogurt-Tempered Meatball Soup (Terbiyeli Sulu Köfte)
recipes.description: Small meatballs simmered in broth, finished with a lemony yogurt tempering.

instructions.text: Grate onion. Mix ground beef, rinsed rice, salt, and pepper. Roll small meatballs.
Simmer meatballs in water for 15–18 minutes until rice is tender. Food safety: meatballs should reach ~71°C internally.
Whisk yogurt, egg yolk, flour, lemon juice. Temper with hot broth, then pour back in.
Heat gently 3–4 minutes without hard boiling. Optional: drizzle mint butter.

recipes.title: Stuffed Zucchini (Kabak Dolması)
recipes.description: Zucchini stuffed with rice, herbs, and aromatics, simmered gently.

instructions.text: Hollow zucchinis. Rinse rice. Sauté onion in olive oil, add rice, grated tomato, paste, mint, salt; cook 3 minutes.
Fill zucchinis loosely. Arrange in pot, add water.
Simmer covered 40–45 minutes until rice is cooked. Rest 10 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Turkish Eggplant Moussaka (Patlıcan Musakka)
recipes.description: Pan-seared eggplant baked with a ground beef tomato sauce.

instructions.text: Slice eggplants, salt 10 minutes, pat dry. Pan-sear with a little oil until softened.
Cook onion in olive oil, add ground beef until browned. Add grated tomatoes, paste, salt, pepper; simmer 10 minutes.
Layer eggplant and sauce in a dish, add water, bake at 190°C for 25–30 minutes. Food safety: ground beef ~71°C.

recipes.title: Okra Stew (Bamya Yemeği)
recipes.description: Tangy okra simmered in a tomato base—best finished with lemon.

instructions.text: Sauté onion in olive oil 4 minutes. Add grated tomatoes (and optional paste) and cook 5 minutes.
Add okra, water, salt. Simmer gently 25–30 minutes.
Finish with lemon juice to reduce sliminess and brighten flavor.

recipes.title: Stuffed Onions (Soğan Dolması)
recipes.description: Onion layers stuffed with spiced rice, simmered in a tangy tomato sauce.

instructions.text: Blanch onions 8–10 minutes, cool, separate into layers.
Mix rice with pastes, olive oil, mint, salt (and optional lemon). Stuff onion layers and roll.
Arrange in pot, add water, simmer covered 45–50 minutes.

recipes.title: Tomato Paste Pasta (Salçalı Makarna)
recipes.description: A quick Turkish weeknight pasta with tomato paste and butter/olive oil.

instructions.text: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente; reserve a little cooking water.
Cook tomato paste in butter/olive oil for 1–2 minutes. Loosen with a splash of pasta water.
Toss pasta with sauce, season with optional pepper, serve.

recipes.title: Baked Pasta (Fırın Makarna)
recipes.description: Creamy baked pasta with béchamel and cheese, Turkish style.

instructions.text: Boil pasta until just under al dente; drain.
Make béchamel: melt butter, whisk in flour 1 minute, add milk gradually. Season.
Combine pasta with béchamel, top with cheese, bake at 190°C for 20 minutes until browned.

recipes.title: Midye Dolma Style Spiced Rice (Midye Dolma İç Pilavı)
recipes.description: Aromatic spiced rice inspired by stuffed mussels—served as a side or mezze filling.

instructions.text: Sauté onions in olive oil until soft. Add rice and optional currants; stir 2 minutes.
Add spices, salt, and water. Cover and simmer 12–15 minutes; rest 10 minutes.
Serve warm as a side or use as a stuffing base.

recipes.title: Tarator (Walnut-Garlic Yogurt Sauce)
recipes.description: A thick walnut-garlic yogurt sauce used with fried vegetables and mezze.

instructions.text: Crush garlic with salt. Chop walnuts finely (or pulse).
Mix yogurt with walnuts and garlic. Optional olive oil drizzle.

recipes.title: Cheese Pogaca (Peynirli Poğaça)
recipes.description: Soft Turkish pastries filled with cheese—perfect for breakfast and tea time.

instructions.text: Mix yeast with warm milk+water and sugar. Add flour, salt, olive oil; knead 8–10 minutes.
Rise 45 minutes. Fill with feta (and parsley). Shape.
Brush with egg yolk (optional). Bake at 190°C for 18–20 minutes until golden.

recipes.title: Zucchini Soup (Kabak Çorbası)
recipes.description: A light zucchini soup finished with yogurt for creaminess.

instructions.text: Sauté onion in olive oil 3 minutes. Add chopped zucchini and cook 2 minutes.
Add water and salt. Simmer 15 minutes, blend smooth.
Optional: whisk in yogurt off heat (temper with a little soup first).

recipes.title: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls (Lahana Sarma)
recipes.description: Cabbage leaves rolled with spiced rice filling, simmered until tender.

instructions.text: Blanch cabbage leaves until pliable. Cool and trim thick veins.
Mix rice with sautéed onion, paste, olive oil, mint, salt. Roll tightly.
Arrange in pot, add water (and optional lemon juice), simmer covered 55–60 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Rice Pilaf (Tavuklu Pilav)
recipes.description: Fluffy rice pilaf topped with tender chicken—classic Turkish street-style comfort.

instructions.text: Simmer chicken in salted water until cooked, shred. Food safety: chicken ~74°C.
Rinse rice. Sauté rice in butter 2 minutes, add water and salt.
Cook covered 12 minutes on low, rest 10 minutes. Serve with shredded chicken on top.

recipes.title: Hummus (Turkish Style)
recipes.description: Creamy chickpea dip with tahini, lemon, garlic, and olive oil.

instructions.text: Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, salt. Add water as needed for smoothness.
Plate and drizzle olive oil. Optional: sprinkle paprika.

recipes.title: Arnavut Ciğeri (Turkish-Style Fried Liver)
recipes.description: Crispy fried liver cubes served with onion-parsley salad.

instructions.text: Cube liver, pat very dry. Toss with flour, salt, and optional paprika.
Fry in hot oil in batches 2–3 minutes until crisp outside. Do not overcook.
Serve with onion-parsley salad and optional sumac.

recipes.title: Eggplant with Yogurt (Patlıcan Yoğurtlama)
recipes.description: Roasted or sautéed eggplant mixed with garlicky yogurt—simple mezze.

instructions.text: Roast or pan-cook diced eggplant until very soft. Cool slightly.
Mix yogurt with crushed garlic and salt.
Fold in eggplant, drizzle optional olive oil, serve.

recipes.title: Beans with Sucuk (Sucuklu Kuru Fasulye)
recipes.description: White beans simmered with Turkish sausage for a rich, hearty dish.

instructions.text: Soak beans overnight, drain. Sauté onion in olive oil, add paste 1 minute.
Add beans, water, simmer 60–70 minutes until tender.
Add sliced sucuk in last 15 minutes. Salt near the end.

recipes.title: Tray Börek with Cheese (Peynirli Tepsi Böreği)
recipes.description: Layered yufka börek baked with a simple milk mixture and cheese filling.

instructions.text: Whisk milk, olive oil, and eggs. Crumble feta (add parsley optional).
Layer yufka in tray, brushing each layer with mixture; add cheese in the middle.
Pour remaining mixture on top, sprinkle sesame optional. Bake at 190°C for 25–30 minutes.

recipes.title: Semolina Cookies (İrmikli Kurabiye)
recipes.description: Tender Turkish cookies with semolina—great with tea.

instructions.text: Mix softened butter and sugar. Add egg and optional vanilla.
Add semolina, flour, baking powder. Form soft dough, shape cookies.
Bake at 180°C for 12–15 minutes until lightly golden.

recipes.title: Vermicelli Soup (Şehriye Çorbası)
recipes.description: A quick tomato-based vermicelli soup, a homey Turkish staple.

instructions.text: Cook tomato paste in butter/olive oil 1 minute.
Add water and salt, bring to boil. Add vermicelli, simmer 8–10 minutes.

recipes.title: Fried Eggplant (Patlıcan Kızartması)
recipes.description: Classic fried eggplant slices—served with yogurt or tomato sauce.

instructions.text: Slice eggplant, salt lightly, rest 10 minutes, pat dry.
Fry in hot oil until golden and soft. Drain on paper towels.

recipes.title: Eggplant Sandwich (Patlıcan Ekmek / Street-Style)
recipes.description: A simple street-style sandwich with fried eggplant, tomato, and optional cheese.

instructions.text: Slice eggplant, salt, pat dry. Fry until golden.
Toast bread lightly. Add sliced tomato, optional pepper and cheese, then eggplant.
Serve immediately while hot.

recipes.title: Lokma (Fried Dough Bites in Syrup)
recipes.description: Small fried dough bites soaked in syrup—sweet and crisp outside.

instructions.text: Make syrup: simmer sugar with 1.5 cups water (use 1.5 su_bardagi as reference) and optional lemon juice 10 minutes; cool.
Mix flour, yeast, water into a sticky batter. Rest 30 minutes.
Fry spooned portions in medium-hot oil until golden, then soak in cool syrup 1–2 minutes.

recipes.title: Sumac Onion Salad (Soğan Salatası)
recipes.description: A quick onion salad with sumac and parsley—perfect with kebabs.

instructions.text: Slice onions thinly. Massage with salt and sumac for 1 minute.
Add chopped parsley and optional lemon juice. Serve.

recipes.title: İmam Bayıldı (Eggplant in Olive Oil)
recipes.description: Eggplants cooked in olive oil with onions, tomatoes, and garlic—served at room temp.

instructions.text: Halve eggplants lengthwise, score, salt lightly, rest 10 minutes, pat dry.
Sauté onions in olive oil until soft. Add garlic and tomatoes; season with salt and optional sugar; cook 10 minutes.
Arrange eggplants in a pot, spoon filling on top, add water, cover and simmer 35–40 minutes.
Cool and serve with extra olive oil if desired.

recipes.title: Karnıyarık (Stuffed Eggplant with Mince)
recipes.description: Split eggplants stuffed with savory minced meat and baked in tomato sauce.

instructions.text: Soften eggplants by pan-searing or baking until pliable. Split and open.
Cook onion in olive oil, add ground beef until browned. Add chopped tomato, paste, salt and pepper; simmer 8–10 minutes.
Stuff eggplants, place in tray, add water around, bake at 190°C for 25–30 minutes. Food safety: mince ~71°C.

recipes.title: Şakşuka with Yogurt (Yoğurtlu Şakşuka)
recipes.description: Tomato-sauced fried vegetables topped with garlicky yogurt.

instructions.text: Cube eggplant (and optional zucchini), fry until golden, drain.
Cook grated tomatoes with 2 cloves garlic and salt 10–12 minutes. Toss fried veg in sauce.
Mix yogurt with remaining crushed garlic and a pinch of salt. Serve yogurt over vegetables.

recipes.title: Kısır (Bulgur Salad)
recipes.description: Fine bulgur tossed with tomato paste, herbs, lemon, and olive oil.

instructions.text: Soak bulgur with water, cover 10 minutes until fluffy.
Mix in pastes, olive oil, lemon, salt. Fold in chopped herbs and green onion.
Rest 10 minutes for best flavor.

recipes.title: Haydari (Thick Yogurt Mezze)
recipes.description: A thick, garlicky yogurt mezze with herbs—perfect with meze plates.

instructions.text: Crush garlic with salt. Mix into thick yogurt.
Fold in chopped dill and optional dried mint. Drizzle optional olive oil.

recipes.title: Onion Omelet (Soğanlı Omlet)
recipes.description: Simple Turkish omelet with sautéed onions and optional peppers.

instructions.text: Sauté sliced onion in olive oil 5–6 minutes until sweet.
Beat eggs with salt (and optional pepper). Pour over onions; cook until set.

recipes.title: Menemen with Cheese (Peynirli Menemen)
recipes.description: Classic menemen finished with crumbled cheese for extra richness.

instructions.text: Sauté peppers in olive oil 2 minutes. Add tomatoes, cook until saucy.
Add eggs, stir gently. When almost set, add optional crumbled cheese.

recipes.title: Simit Toast (Simit Tostu)
recipes.description: Quick toasted simit sandwich with cheese and tomato.

instructions.text: Slice simit, add cheese (and optional tomato). Optional: lightly butter inside.
Toast in pan or press until cheese melts.

recipes.title: Classic Rice Pilaf (Sade Pirinç Pilavı)
recipes.description: Fluffy Turkish rice pilaf with butter and the right water ratio.

instructions.text: Rinse rice until water runs clearer; drain well.
Sauté rice in butter 2 minutes. Add water and salt, bring to boil.
Cover, simmer 12 minutes on low, rest 10 minutes, fluff.

recipes.title: Rice Pilaf with Vermicelli (Şehriyeli Pilav)
recipes.description: Rice pilaf with toasted vermicelli—golden and fragrant.

instructions.text: Toast vermicelli in butter until golden. Add rinsed rice, sauté 2 minutes.
Add water and salt. Simmer covered 12 minutes, rest 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Beans with Beef (Etli Kuru Fasulye)
recipes.description: Classic Turkish stewed beans with tender beef cubes.

instructions.text: Soak beans overnight, drain. Brown beef with olive oil, add onion and cook 4 minutes.
Add tomato paste 1 minute, then beans and water. Simmer 75–90 minutes until tender.
Salt near the end. Food safety: beef should be fully cooked and tender.

recipes.title: Tas Kebabı (Beef Stew)
recipes.description: A simple Turkish beef stew with onions and tomato—served with rice.

instructions.text: Brown beef (optional: with a little butter). Add onions and cook 5 minutes.
Add tomato paste, stir 1 minute. Add water and salt.
Simmer covered 60–75 minutes until tender.

recipes.title: Chicken Soup with Lemon Tempering (Terbiyeli Tavuk Çorbası)
recipes.description: Comforting chicken soup finished with a lemony egg tempering.

instructions.text: Simmer chicken in salted water until cooked; shred. Food safety: chicken ~74°C.
Optional: add rice and simmer until tender.
Whisk egg yolks with lemon juice (and optional flour). Temper with hot broth and stir back in.
Heat gently 2–3 minutes without boiling hard.

recipes.title: Semolina Milk Dessert (İrmik Tatlısı)
recipes.description: Quick stovetop semolina pudding set in bowls—light and nostalgic.

instructions.text: Whisk milk, semolina, and sugar in a pot.
Cook on medium, stirring, until thickened (8–10 minutes). Add optional vanilla.
Pour into bowls and chill to set.

recipes.title: Flour Halva (Un Helvası)
recipes.description: Toasted flour cooked in butter and sweetened with simple syrup.

instructions.text: Dissolve sugar in water and warm (simple syrup).
Toast flour in butter on low, stirring, until deep golden and nutty.
Carefully add warm syrup, stir until absorbed. Rest 10 minutes, serve.

recipes.title: Plain Yeast Rolls (Mayalı Sade Poğaça)
recipes.description: Soft, plain poğaça rolls—base dough for any filling.

instructions.text: Mix yeast with warm milk and sugar. Add flour, salt, olive oil; knead 8–10 minutes.
Rise 45 minutes. Shape rolls. Optional: brush with egg yolk.
Bake at 190°C for 18–20 minutes until golden.

recipes.title: Turkish Cheese Toast (Kaşarlı Tost)
recipes.description: Simple pressed toast with melty cheese—classic quick bite.

instructions.text: Place cheese between bread slices. Optional: butter outside lightly.
Toast in pan/press until golden and cheese melts.

recipes.title: Potato Layer Casserole (Patates Oturtma)
recipes.description: Sliced potatoes layered with a savory minced meat sauce, baked until tender.

instructions.text: Slice potatoes. Pan-sear lightly (optional) or use raw for softer texture.
Cook onion in olive oil, add mince until browned, add paste (and optional tomato), salt; simmer 5 minutes.
Layer potatoes and sauce, add water, bake at 190°C for 35–40 minutes. Food safety: mince ~71°C.

recipes.title: Artichokes in Olive Oil (Zeytinyağlı Enginar)
recipes.description: Aegean-style artichokes with carrots and peas, finished with lemon.

instructions.text: Place artichokes in pot, add carrots (and optional peas).
Add olive oil, water, salt, and lemon juice. Simmer covered 25–30 minutes.
Cool and serve at room temperature with extra lemon if desired.

recipes.title: Arugula Salad (Roka Salatası)
recipes.description: Peppery arugula salad with lemon and olive oil—great with fish and kebabs.

instructions.text: Wash and dry arugula. Dress with lemon juice, olive oil, and salt.
Toss and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Ezogelin Soup (Ezo Gelin Çorbası)
recipes.description: Hearty Turkish soup with red lentils, bulgur, and mint.

instructions.text: Sauté chopped onion in olive oil (and optional butter) 3 minutes. Add tomato paste and cook 1 minute.
Add lentils, water, salt. Simmer 15 minutes.
Add bulgur (and optional vermicelli) and mint. Simmer 10–12 minutes until tender.

recipes.title: Lentil Patties (Mercimek Köftesi)
recipes.description: Red lentil and bulgur patties—classic vegan Turkish mezze.

instructions.text: Simmer lentils with water until very soft and water is mostly absorbed.
Stir in bulgur, cover 10 minutes to swell.
Sauté onion in olive oil, add pastes and spices, then mix into lentil-bulgur base.
Fold in chopped green onion and parsley. Shape into patties.

recipes.title: Cacık (Yogurt & Cucumber Dip)
recipes.description: Cooling yogurt-cucumber dip with garlic and mint.

instructions.text: Grate or finely chop cucumber; squeeze excess liquid if very watery.
Mix yogurt with salt, optional garlic and mint. Loosen with optional water.
Fold in cucumber and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Barbunya in Olive Oil (Zeytinyağlı Barbunya)
recipes.description: Aegean-style borlotti beans cooked with carrots and tomato, served at room temp.

instructions.text: Sauté onion in olive oil 4 minutes. Add carrots and cook 3 minutes.
Add tomatoes, salt, optional sugar, and water; simmer 10 minutes.
Add cooked beans and simmer 20–25 minutes. Cool and serve.

recipes.title: Spinach Stew (Ispanak Yemeği)
recipes.description: Spinach cooked with onion and rice in a light tomato base.

instructions.text: Sauté chopped onion in olive oil 4 minutes. Add optional tomato paste and cook 1 minute.
Add spinach, salt, and water. Cover and cook 10 minutes.
Optional: add rice and cook 10–12 minutes more until tender.

recipes.title: Chicken Sauté (Tavuk Sote)
recipes.description: Quick sautéed chicken with peppers and tomatoes—weeknight classic.

instructions.text: Sauté onion in olive oil 3 minutes. Add chicken strips and cook until no longer pink.
Add peppers, cook 4 minutes. Add tomatoes, salt, and optional paprika; simmer 6–8 minutes.
Food safety: chicken should reach ~74°C internal temperature.

recipes.title: Pan-Fried Meatballs (Köfte)
recipes.description: Simple Turkish meatballs—juicy, seasoned, and pan-seared.

instructions.text: Grate onion and squeeze out excess juice. Mix with ground beef, salt, and spices.
Shape meatballs. Pan-sear with optional olive oil 3–4 minutes per side.
Food safety: ground beef should reach ~71°C internally.

recipes.title: Potato Salad (Patates Salatası)
recipes.description: Classic Turkish potato salad with scallions, parsley, lemon, and olive oil.

instructions.text: Boil potatoes until tender, peel if desired, cube while warm.
Toss with lemon juice, olive oil, salt. Fold in chopped green onion and parsley.

recipes.title: Çoban Salad (Çoban Salata)
recipes.description: Chopped tomato-cucumber-pepper salad with lemon and olive oil.

instructions.text: Chop all vegetables small. Add optional parsley.
Dress with lemon juice, olive oil, and salt. Toss and serve.

recipes.title: Yayla Soup (Yayla Çorbası)
recipes.description: Creamy yogurt soup with rice and mint—light and comforting.

instructions.text: Simmer rice in water until tender.
Whisk yogurt, egg yolk, flour, and salt. Temper with hot broth, stir back in.
Heat gently without hard boiling. Optional: drizzle mint butter.

recipes.title: Green Beans in Olive Oil (Zeytinyağlı Taze Fasulye)
recipes.description: Green beans simmered with tomatoes and onions—served at room temperature.

instructions.text: Sauté onions in olive oil 5 minutes. Add tomatoes and cook 5 minutes.
Add beans, salt, optional sugar, and water. Simmer covered 30–35 minutes.
Cool and serve at room temperature.

recipes.title: Fried Meatballs (Kuru Köfte)
recipes.description: Home-style fried meatballs—crisp outside, juicy inside.

instructions.text: Mix mince with grated onion, salt, and optional egg and cumin. Shape.
Optional: dust with flour. Fry in oil until browned, turning often.
Food safety: mince should reach ~71°C internal temperature.

recipes.title: Tray Baked Chicken & Vegetables (Fırında Tavuk)
recipes.description: One-tray chicken with potatoes and peppers—easy and flavorful.

instructions.text: Toss chicken and vegetables with olive oil, paprika, and salt.
Bake at 200°C for 40–45 minutes until browned.
Food safety: chicken should reach ~74°C internal temperature.

recipes.title: Crispy Cheese Rolls (Sigara Böreği)
recipes.description: Thin yufka rolls filled with cheese, fried until crisp.

instructions.text: Crumble feta (mix optional parsley). Cut yufka into triangles.
Fill and roll tightly, sealing edge with water.
Fry in hot oil until golden, drain and serve.

recipes.title: Milk Pudding (Muhallebi)
recipes.description: Silky Turkish milk pudding, lightly sweet and served chilled.

instructions.text: Whisk milk, sugar, and cornstarch until smooth.
Cook over medium, stirring, until thick (6–8 minutes). Add optional vanilla.
Pour into bowls and chill.

recipes.title: Kazandibi-Style Caramel Milk Pudding (Kazandibi)
recipes.description: Milk pudding with a lightly caramelized base, inspired by kazandibi.

instructions.text: Cook milk, sugar, and cornstarch until thick, stirring constantly.
Optional: stir in butter for sheen.
Pour into a wide pan and gently caramelize the bottom on low heat until lightly browned; chill before slicing.

recipes.title: Bulgur Pilaf (Bulgur Pilavı)
recipes.description: Tomato-paste bulgur pilaf—fast, filling, and very Turkish.

instructions.text: Cook tomato paste in olive oil 1 minute.
Add bulgur, stir 1 minute. Add water and salt.
Cover and simmer 12 minutes. Rest 10 minutes and fluff.

recipes.title: Chickpea Stew (Nohut Yemeği)
recipes.description: Classic nohut stew with onions and tomato paste—great with rice.

instructions.text: Soak chickpeas overnight, drain. Sauté onion in olive oil 4 minutes, add paste 1 minute.
Add chickpeas and water, simmer 50–60 minutes until tender.
Salt near the end and serve.

recipes.title: Chicken & Chickpea Stew (Tavuklu Nohut)
recipes.description: Chickpeas simmered with chicken for a lighter take on the classic stew.

instructions.text: Soak chickpeas overnight, drain. Brown chicken lightly with olive oil, add onion and cook 4 minutes.
Add tomato paste 1 minute. Add chickpeas and water, simmer 50–55 minutes until tender.
Salt near the end. Food safety: chicken should reach ~74°C internal temperature.

recipes.title: Tomato Bulgur Soup (Bulgur Çorbası)
recipes.description: Simple tomato-based bulgur soup—fast and comforting.

instructions.text: Cook tomato paste in olive oil 1 minute.
Add water and salt; bring to boil. Add bulgur and simmer 10–12 minutes.
Optional: add dried mint and serve.

recipes.title: Leeks in Olive Oil (Zeytinyağlı Pırasa)
recipes.description: Aegean-style leeks cooked with carrots and olive oil, served at room temperature.

instructions.text: Slice leeks and carrots. Sauté briefly in olive oil 3–4 minutes.
Add water, salt, optional sugar; cover and simmer 30–35 minutes.
Finish with lemon juice. Cool and serve at room temperature.

recipes.title: Celery Root in Olive Oil (Zeytinyağlı Kereviz)
recipes.description: Aegean-style celery root with carrots, finished with lemon.

instructions.text: Peel and cube celery root and carrots. Add to pot with olive oil and water.
Season with salt and optional sugar. Simmer covered 30–35 minutes.
Finish with lemon juice, cool and serve.

recipes.title: Fried Anchovies (Hamsi Tava)
recipes.description: Crispy pan-fried anchovies—Black Sea classic.

instructions.text: Clean anchovies. Toss with salt and cornmeal.
Pan-fry in hot oil until crisp and golden, turning once.

recipes.title: Mushroom Sauté (Mantar Sote)
recipes.description: Quick sautéed mushrooms with peppers and garlic.

instructions.text: Sauté mushrooms in olive oil on high heat until moisture evaporates.
Add optional peppers and garlic, cook 3–4 minutes.
Season with salt and optional pepper.

recipes.title: Orzo Soup (Arpa Şehriye Çorbası)
recipes.description: Light tomato-based soup with orzo—simple and comforting.

instructions.text: Cook tomato paste in olive oil 1 minute.
Add water and salt, bring to boil. Add orzo and simmer 10–12 minutes.

recipes.title: Rice Pudding (Sütlaç)
recipes.description: Classic Turkish rice pudding—creamy, lightly sweet.

instructions.text: Simmer rice in water until very soft and water is absorbed.
Add milk and cook 15–20 minutes, stirring.
Add sugar, cook 3–4 minutes more. Pour into bowls and chill.

recipes.title: Revani (Semolina Syrup Cake)
recipes.description: Moist semolina cake soaked in syrup—iconic Turkish dessert.

instructions.text: Make syrup: simmer water + lemon juice + 1 cup sugar (from ingredients) until slightly thick; cool.
Whisk eggs well, then add yogurt. Fold in semolina, flour, baking powder.
Bake at 180°C for 30–35 minutes. Pour cool syrup over hot cake. Rest before slicing.

recipes.title: Fried Cauliflower (Karnabahar Kızartması)
recipes.description: Crispy cauliflower florets—great with yogurt dip.

instructions.text: Boil cauliflower florets 4–5 minutes, drain well.
Beat eggs with salt, coat florets with flour then egg.
Fry until golden. Optional: serve with garlicky yogurt.

recipes.title: Baked Zucchini Fritters (Fırında Mücver)
recipes.description: Oven-baked mucver—lighter version of the classic.

instructions.text: Grate zucchini, salt lightly, squeeze out excess liquid.
Mix with eggs, flour, optional dill, and olive oil.
Spread on tray, bake at 190°C for 22–25 minutes until set and lightly golden.

recipes.title: Ali Nazik (Eggplant Yogurt with Mince)
recipes.description: Smoky eggplant yogurt topped with sautéed minced meat.

instructions.text: Roast eggplants until smoky, peel and chop.
Mix yogurt with optional garlic and a pinch of salt; fold in eggplant.
Sauté ground beef (optional: in butter) with salt until cooked. Food safety: mince ~71°C.
Serve meat over eggplant yogurt base.

recipes.title: Stuffed Peppers (Biber Dolması)
recipes.description: Peppers stuffed with herby rice—classic Turkish dolma.

instructions.text: Sauté onion in olive oil 4 minutes. Add rice, tomato paste, salt; stir 2 minutes.
Add chopped parsley (optional). Stuff peppers, place in pot.
Add water, cover and simmer 40–45 minutes until rice is tender.

recipes.title: Stuffed Vine Leaves (Zeytinyağlı Yaprak Sarma)
recipes.description: Vine leaves stuffed with herby rice, served cool with lemon.

instructions.text: Sauté onion in olive oil 4 minutes. Add rice, salt, optional mint; stir 2 minutes.
Roll vine leaves with filling. Arrange tightly in pot.
Add water and lemon juice. Simmer covered 45–50 minutes; cool before serving.

recipes.title: Baked İçli Köfte (Fırında İçli Köfte)
recipes.description: Bulgur shell filled with spiced mince, baked for a lighter version.

instructions.text: Soak bulgur with water and salt until pliable; knead, adding optional flour if needed.
Cook filling: sauté onion in olive oil, add mince, cook through. Food safety: mince ~71°C.
Form shells, fill, seal. Bake at 200°C for 20–25 minutes until firm and lightly browned.

recipes.title: Homestyle Lahmacun (Ev Usulü Lahmacun)
recipes.description: Thin dough topped with spiced minced meat mixture, baked hot.

instructions.text: Dough: mix flour, water, and salt; rest 15 minutes; divide and roll thin.
Topping: finely chop tomato and onion; mix with mince, optional pepper paste, olive oil, and a pinch of salt.
Spread thinly and bake at 250°C (very hot) 6–8 minutes per batch. Food safety: mince fully cooked.

recipes.title: Stuffed Mussels (Ev Usulü Midye Dolma)
recipes.description: Spiced rice stuffed mussels with lemon—street-food favorite (home style).

instructions.text: Clean mussels thoroughly. Sauté onion in olive oil; add rice and salt, stir 2 minutes.
Add water, simmer 10 minutes until rice is half-cooked. Cool slightly.
Stuff mussels, arrange in pot, add a little water, steam 12–15 minutes. Food safety: shellfish fully cooked.
Serve with lemon.

recipes.title: Easy Pan Mantı (Kolay Tava Mantısı)
recipes.description: Quick dumpling-style dish: small pasta pieces baked with yogurt-garlic sauce (mantı-inspired).

instructions.text: Boil pasta in salted water, drain.
Mix yogurt with optional garlic and a pinch of salt.
Optional sauce: sizzle butter with tomato paste. Serve pasta with yogurt and drizzle sauce.

recipes.title: Yogurt Potato Bowl (Yoğurtlu Patates)
recipes.description: Warm potatoes with garlicky yogurt and olive oil—quick mezze/side.

instructions.text: Boil potatoes until tender, cube while warm, season with salt.
Mix yogurt with optional garlic. Combine with potatoes, drizzle olive oil.

recipes.title: Chicken Vermicelli Pilaf (Tavuklu Şehriye Pilavı)
recipes.description: Toasted vermicelli pilaf with shredded chicken—simple and filling.

instructions.text: Cook chicken until done and shred. Food safety: chicken ~74°C.
Toast vermicelli in butter, add rinsed rice, stir 2 minutes.
Add water, salt, and chicken. Simmer 12 minutes, rest 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Lamb Skewers (Kuzu Şiş)
recipes.description: Simple lamb skewers, grilled or pan-seared.

instructions.text: Cube lamb. Optional: grate onion and rub into meat; add olive oil and salt.
Skewer and grill/pan-sear 10–12 minutes, turning. Use a thermometer if possible.

recipes.title: Tahinli Piyaz (Bean Salad with Tahini)
recipes.description: Antalya-style piyaz: beans with tahini-lemon sauce.

instructions.text: Whisk tahini with lemon juice until creamy, then add olive oil and salt.
Toss with beans and optional finely sliced onion.

recipes.title: Homestyle Chicken Döner (Ev Usulü Tavuk Döner)
recipes.description: Seasoned chicken cooked in strips—döner-inspired home version.

instructions.text: Slice chicken thin. Optional: coat with yogurt, plus olive oil, salt, and paprika.
Cook on hot pan until browned and cooked through. Food safety: chicken ~74°C.

recipes.title: Imam Bayildi (Stuffed Eggplant in Olive Oil)
recipes.description: Eggplants stuffed with onion-tomato filling, cooked in olive oil and served at room temperature.

instructions.text: Split eggplants lengthwise (not fully through). Lightly sauté or roast until softened.
Sauté onions in olive oil, add tomatoes and optional garlic; season with salt and optional sugar.
Stuff eggplants, add water, simmer covered 35–40 minutes. Cool and serve.

recipes.title: Karniyarik (Stuffed Eggplant with Mince)
recipes.description: Fried/roasted eggplants filled with spiced minced meat and tomatoes.

instructions.text: Soften eggplants by roasting or shallow-frying; slit down the middle.
Cook onions in olive oil, add mince; cook through. Food safety: mince should reach ~71°C.
Add tomatoes and optional paste; season. Stuff eggplants, add water, bake/simmer 25–30 minutes.

recipes.title: Hunkar Begendi (Lamb Stew on Eggplant Puree)
recipes.description: Tender lamb served over smoky eggplant béchamel-style puree.

instructions.text: Sauté onion, add lamb cubes, brown. Add tomato paste, then water; simmer 60 minutes until tender.
Roast eggplants until smoky, peel and mash.
Make puree: melt butter, stir in flour 1 minute, add milk, then eggplant; season with salt.
Serve lamb over eggplant puree.

recipes.title: Tas Kebabı (Turkish Beef Stew)
recipes.description: Slow-simmered beef stew with onions and potatoes.

instructions.text: Brown beef in olive oil, add onions and cook 5 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste 1 minute, add water and salt; simmer 60 minutes.
Add potatoes and cook 15 minutes until tender.

recipes.title: Kuru Fasulye (White Bean Stew)
recipes.description: Classic Turkish bean stew with tomato paste—best with rice.

instructions.text: Soak beans overnight, drain. Sauté onion in olive oil 4 minutes.
Add tomato paste 1 minute, add beans and water; simmer 70–75 minutes until tender.
Add salt near the end and serve.

recipes.title: İç Pilav (Spiced Rice Pilaf)
recipes.description: Fragrant rice pilaf with currants and pine nuts (optional).

instructions.text: Sauté onion in butter + olive oil. Add optional pine nuts and toast lightly.
Add rinsed rice, stir 2 minutes. Add optional currants, water, and salt.
Simmer covered 12 minutes, rest 10 minutes, fluff.

recipes.title: Şakşuka (Fried Vegetables in Tomato Sauce)
recipes.description: Eggplant and zucchini fried/roasted, topped with garlicky tomato sauce.

instructions.text: Cube eggplant and zucchini. Fry or roast until golden; drain.
Cook chopped tomatoes with optional garlic and salt 10–12 minutes.
Top vegetables with sauce (optional olive oil drizzle) and serve.

recipes.title: Fava (Split Fava Bean Puree)
recipes.description: Aegean mezze: silky fava puree served cold with olive oil.

instructions.text: Simmer fava beans with water, onion, and salt until very soft (30–35 minutes).
Blend smooth with olive oil and lemon juice.
Pour into dish, chill until set; drizzle a little olive oil before serving.

recipes.title: Tarhana Soup (Tarhana Çorbası)
recipes.description: Traditional fermented tarhana soup—tangy and comforting.

instructions.text: Whisk tarhana with a little cold water to dissolve, then add remaining water.
Simmer 12–15 minutes, stirring often. Season with salt.
Optional: finish with butter or olive oil.

recipes.title: İşkembe Soup (Trippa Soup)
recipes.description: Garlicky tripe soup, traditionally served with vinegar and chili.

instructions.text: Simmer tripe in water until tender (50–60 minutes). Chop finely.
Mix flour with a little broth, whisk back into soup; simmer 5 minutes.
Finish with butter, salt, and optional garlic.

recipes.title: Easy Su Böreği (Kolay Tava Su Böreği)
recipes.description: Layered yufka with cheese, cooked in a pan—su böreği inspired shortcut.

instructions.text: Whisk eggs with milk and optional salt.
Layer yufka in a buttered pan, soaking each layer lightly in egg-milk; add cheese in the middle.
Cook covered on low heat 10 minutes, flip, cook 8–10 minutes more.

recipes.title: Cheese Gözleme (Peynirli Gözleme)
recipes.description: Thin griddle flatbread stuffed with cheese.

instructions.text: Make dough: mix flour, water, salt; knead 5 minutes; rest 10 minutes.
Divide, roll thin, add cheese, fold and seal.
Cook on hot dry pan until browned; optional brush with butter.

recipes.title: Cheese Pide (Peynirli Pide)
recipes.description: Boat-shaped Turkish flatbread with cheese topping.

instructions.text: Make dough: mix flour, water, salt, olive oil; knead 6–8 minutes; rest 15 minutes.
Shape into boats, add cheese, optional egg on top.
Bake at 220°C for 15–18 minutes until golden.

recipes.title: Homestyle Kumpir (Ev Usulü Kumpir)
recipes.description: Baked potatoes mashed with butter and cheese, topped as desired.

instructions.text: Bake potatoes at 200°C until very soft (55–60 minutes).
Split, mash inside with butter, cheese, and salt until creamy.
Add your preferred toppings (not included) and serve hot.

recipes.title: Stuffed Zucchini Blossoms (Kabak Çiçeği Dolması)
recipes.description: Delicate zucchini blossoms stuffed with herby rice—Aegean specialty.

instructions.text: Sauté onion in olive oil, add rice, salt, optional mint; stir 2 minutes.
Stuff blossoms loosely and close tips; arrange tightly in pot.
Add water, simmer covered 35–40 minutes; cool slightly before serving.

recipes.title: Hamsili Pilav (Anchovy Rice Pilaf)
recipes.description: Black Sea pilaf baked with anchovies—savory and aromatic.

instructions.text: Clean anchovies. Cook pilaf base: sauté onion, add rice, water, salt; cook 12 minutes, rest 10 minutes.
Line a baking dish with anchovies, add pilaf, cover with anchovies.
Bake at 200°C for 20 minutes. Fish must be fully cooked.

recipes.title: Oven Lamb Shank (Fırında Kuzu İncik)
recipes.description: Slow-roasted lamb shanks with onions—fall-apart tender.

instructions.text: Season lamb shanks with salt and olive oil. Add sliced onions and water to a covered dish.
Bake covered at 170°C for ~2.5 hours until very tender, turning once.

recipes.title: Aşure (Noah’s Pudding)
recipes.description: Traditional mixed-grain dessert with dried fruits and legumes.

instructions.text: Soak chickpeas and beans overnight; cook until tender.
Simmer wheat berries in water until soft, add cooked legumes and optional fruits.
Add sugar, simmer 10–15 minutes to thicken slightly. Portion and cool.

recipes.title: Şekerpare (Syrup Cookies)
recipes.description: Tender semolina cookies soaked in lemony syrup.

instructions.text: Syrup: simmer water + 1.25 cups sugar (from ingredients) + lemon juice 10 minutes; cool.
Dough: mix butter, eggs, remaining sugar, semolina, flour, baking powder; shape cookies.
Bake at 180°C for 20–25 minutes. Pour cool syrup over hot cookies; rest.

recipes.title: Kısır (Bulgur Salad)
recipes.description: Fine bulgur salad with tomato paste, lemon, olive oil, and herbs.

instructions.text: Soak bulgur with water 10 minutes until fluffy.
Mix in tomato paste, olive oil, lemon juice, salt.
Fold in chopped parsley and optional green onion.

recipes.title: Adana Kebab
recipes.description: Spicy minced meat kebab shaped on skewers and grilled.

instructions.text: Knead ground lamb with salt and chili flakes (optional: very finely grated onion, squeezed dry).
Shape onto skewers, pressing firmly.
Grill 10–12 minutes, turning. Food safety: minced meat should reach ~71°C.

recipes.title: Urfa Kebab
recipes.description: Mild minced kebab—aromatic, less spicy than Adana.

instructions.text: Knead lamb with salt and optional paprika until sticky.
Shape on skewers.
Grill 10–12 minutes, turning. Food safety: mince ~71°C.

recipes.title: İskender Kebab
recipes.description: Sliced meat over bread with tomato butter sauce and yogurt.

instructions.text: Cube bread and warm lightly. Warm doner meat in a pan.
Sauce: melt butter, stir in tomato paste 1 minute, add water to loosen.
Plate bread, add meat, drizzle sauce, serve with yogurt.

recipes.title: Tantuni
recipes.description: Mersin-style thin-sliced meat sauté wrapped in lavash with onions.

instructions.text: Slice beef very thin. Sauté in olive oil on high heat with salt until cooked.
Warm lavash. Fill with sliced onion and optional parsley, add meat.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Homestyle Kokoreç (Ev Usulü Kokoreç)
recipes.description: Chopped cooked offal seasoned and sautéed—kokoreç inspired home version.

instructions.text: Sauté optional peppers and tomatoes in olive oil 3 minutes.
Add chopped cooked kokoreç, paprika, optional salt; sauté 6–8 minutes.

recipes.title: Balık Ekmek (Fish Sandwich)
recipes.description: Pan-seared fish in bread with onions and greens—iconic Istanbul street food.

instructions.text: Season fish with salt. Pan-sear in olive oil until cooked through.
Fill bread with fish, sliced onion, optional parsley, and lemon juice.

recipes.title: Minced Pide (Kıymalı Pide)
recipes.description: Boat-shaped baked pide topped with spiced mince.

instructions.text: Dough: mix flour, water, salt (optional yeast). Knead 6–8 minutes; rest 20 minutes.
Topping: finely chop onion and tomato, mix with mince and olive oil (plus a pinch of salt).
Shape boats, spread topping thinly, bake at 220°C for 15–18 minutes. Food safety: mince fully cooked.

recipes.title: Diced Meat Pide (Kuşbaşılı Pide)
recipes.description: Baked pide topped with diced meat and tomatoes.

instructions.text: Dough: mix flour, water, salt (optional yeast). Knead and rest 20 minutes.
Top: dice meat small; mix with chopped tomato, optional onion, olive oil, and a pinch of salt.
Bake at 220°C for 15–18 minutes until browned; meat must be fully cooked.

recipes.title: Etli Ekmek (Konya Style)
recipes.description: Long thin flatbread topped with minced meat—Konya specialty.

instructions.text: Dough: mix flour, water, salt; knead and rest 20 minutes.
Mix mince with grated onion (squeezed) and optional tomato paste; season with a pinch of salt.
Roll very thin and long, spread topping thinly; bake at 250°C for 6–8 minutes per piece. Mince must be fully cooked.

recipes.title: Ciğer Şiş (Liver Skewers)
recipes.description: Quick-grilled liver skewers—served with onions and flatbread.

instructions.text: Cube liver, skewer, season with salt.
Grill 6–8 minutes, turning often, until cooked through.
Serve with optional sliced onion.

recipes.title: İzmir Köfte
recipes.description: Baked meatballs with potatoes and tomato sauce—Aegean favorite.

instructions.text: Mix mince with grated onion and salt; shape meatballs.
Slice potatoes; arrange with meatballs in tray. Mix tomato paste with water and pour in.
Bake at 200°C for 40–45 minutes. Food safety: meatballs ~71°C.

recipes.title: Eggplant Musakka (Patlıcan Musakka)
recipes.description: Layered eggplant with mince and tomato—home-style musakka.

instructions.text: Soften eggplant slices by roasting or pan-searing.
Cook onion in olive oil, add mince and cook through. Food safety: mince ~71°C.
Add tomatoes and salt; simmer 8–10 minutes. Combine with eggplant and bake 15 minutes (optional water if needed).

recipes.title: Stuffed Zucchini (Kabak Dolması)
recipes.description: Zucchini stuffed with herby rice—light and classic.

instructions.text: Hollow zucchinis. Sauté onion in olive oil, add rice, optional paste, salt, optional dill; stir 2 minutes.
Stuff zucchinis, place in pot, add water.
Simmer covered 40–45 minutes until rice is tender.

recipes.title: Cabbage Rolls (Lahana Sarması)
recipes.description: Cabbage leaves rolled with rice filling in a light tomato broth.

instructions.text: Blanch cabbage leaves until flexible. Sauté onion in olive oil, add rice, paste, salt; stir 2 minutes.
Roll leaves, arrange tightly in pot.
Add water and simmer covered 55–60 minutes.

recipes.title: Kapuska (Cabbage Stew)
recipes.description: Cabbage stew with tomato paste—simple, winter comfort.

instructions.text: Sauté onion in olive oil 4 minutes; add tomato paste 1 minute.
Add sliced cabbage, water, salt. Simmer 30–35 minutes.

recipes.title: Okra Stew (Bamya Yemeği)
recipes.description: Okra simmered with tomato and lemon—classic Turkish stew.

instructions.text: Sauté onion in olive oil 4 minutes. Add tomatoes and cook 5 minutes.
Add okra, water, salt, and lemon juice. Simmer 35–40 minutes gently.

recipes.title: Black-Eyed Peas in Olive Oil (Zeytinyağlı Börülce)
recipes.description: Aegean-style black-eyed peas with onion and lemon.

instructions.text: Simmer peas in water until tender (30–35 minutes), drain.
Sauté onion in olive oil; toss with peas, salt, and lemon juice. Serve room temp.

recipes.title: Artichokes in Olive Oil (Zeytinyağlı Enginar)
recipes.description: Aegean artichokes cooked with carrots and peas, finished with lemon.

instructions.text: Arrange artichokes, carrots, and optional peas in pot.
Add olive oil, water, salt; simmer covered 30–35 minutes.
Finish with lemon juice; cool and serve.

recipes.title: Zucchini in Olive Oil (Zeytinyağlı Kabak)
recipes.description: Light olive-oil zucchini stew with tomatoes and dill (optional).

instructions.text: Sauté onion in olive oil 4 minutes; add tomatoes 3 minutes.
Add zucchini, salt, optional water; simmer 18–20 minutes.
Finish with optional dill; serve warm or room temp.

recipes.title: Purslane with Yogurt (Yoğurtlu Semizotu)
recipes.description: Cool yogurt mezze with fresh purslane and garlic (optional).

instructions.text: Chop purslane. Mix yogurt with salt and optional garlic.
Fold in purslane; optional olive oil drizzle.

recipes.title: Gavurdağı Salad (Gavurdağı Salatası)
recipes.description: Tomato salad with walnuts and pomegranate molasses—Antep style.

instructions.text: Dice vegetables small. Add crushed walnuts.
Dress with olive oil, salt, and optional pomegranate molasses.

recipes.title: Haydari (Thick Yogurt Dip)
recipes.description: Thick, garlicky yogurt dip with herbs—classic meze.

instructions.text: Mix strained yogurt with salt and optional garlic.
Add optional dill and mint; drizzle optional olive oil.

recipes.title: Atom (Spicy Yogurt Mezze)
recipes.description: Yogurt topped with chili butter—simple, bold meze.

instructions.text: Season strained yogurt with salt in a bowl.
Melt butter, add chili flakes 10 seconds, pour over yogurt.

recipes.title: Muhammara (Pepper & Walnut Dip)
recipes.description: Antep-style red pepper and walnut dip with pomegranate molasses.

instructions.text: Blend peppers and walnuts to a coarse paste.
Mix in optional breadcrumbs, olive oil, salt, and optional pomegranate molasses.

recipes.title: Classic Piyaz (Bean Salad)
recipes.description: White bean salad with onions, parsley, lemon, and olive oil.

instructions.text: Slice onion thin, chop parsley. Combine with beans.
Dress with lemon juice, olive oil, and salt.

recipes.title: Kayseri Mantı
recipes.description: Tiny dumplings served with garlicky yogurt and tomato butter sauce.

instructions.text: Dough: mix flour, water, and salt; knead 6–8 minutes; rest 20 minutes.
Filling: mix mince with finely grated onion and a pinch of salt.
Roll thin, cut small squares, fill and pinch closed. Boil until dumplings float and cook through. Food safety: mince ~71°C.
Sauces: mix yogurt with optional garlic and salt. Melt butter, stir in tomato paste 30–60 seconds. Serve together.

recipes.title: Meatless Çiğ Köfte (Etsiz Çiğ Köfte)
recipes.description: Bulgur-based spicy patties—popular meatless version.

instructions.text: Soak bulgur with water 10 minutes.
Knead with tomato paste, optional pepper paste, olive oil, salt, optional chili until cohesive.
Shape into small patties.

recipes.title: İnegöl Köfte
recipes.description: Mild, juicy grilled meatballs—famous Bursa style.

instructions.text: Knead mince with salt (optional: add a little water while kneading for tenderness).
Shape oblong meatballs.
Grill or pan-sear until cooked. Food safety: mince ~71°C.

recipes.title: Lamb Casserole (Kuzu Güveç)
recipes.description: Oven-baked lamb with vegetables—slow, rich, and comforting.

instructions.text: Layer lamb and vegetables in a covered casserole; add salt and water.
Bake covered at 170°C for ~2 hours until very tender.

recipes.title: Etli Türlü (Mixed Vegetable Stew with Meat)
recipes.description: Mixed vegetables simmered with meat in tomato base—home staple.

instructions.text: Brown beef, add tomato paste 1 minute, then water and salt; simmer 35 minutes.
Add vegetables and tomatoes; simmer 25 minutes until tender.

recipes.title: Perde Pilavı (Siirt Style Rice in Pastry)
recipes.description: Festive rice pilaf baked in a buttery crust.

instructions.text: Cook chicken and shred. Food safety: chicken ~74°C.
Pilaf: sauté rice in butter, add water and salt; cook 12 minutes, rest 10 minutes; mix with chicken.
Crust: mix flour, eggs, a pinch of salt; roll and line a bowl/pan.
Fill with pilaf, seal, bake at 180°C for 35–40 minutes; unmold to serve.

recipes.title: Meat Vine Leaf Rolls (Etli Yaprak Sarma)
recipes.description: Vine leaves rolled with rice and minced meat—served warm.

instructions.text: Mix rice, mince, grated onion, olive oil, and salt.
Roll vine leaves tightly, arrange in pot.
Add water and simmer covered 65–70 minutes. Food safety: mince ~71°C.

recipes.title: Chicken Rice Pilaf (Tavuklu Pilav)
recipes.description: Classic chicken and rice pilaf served with broth-soaked rice.

instructions.text: Boil chicken until done, reserve broth, shred. Food safety: chicken ~74°C.
Toast rice in butter, add broth/water and salt; simmer 12 minutes, rest 10 minutes.
Serve pilaf topped with shredded chicken.

recipes.title: Chicken Soup (Tavuk Çorbası)
recipes.description: Simple chicken soup with rice—comforting and light.

instructions.text: Simmer chicken in water until cooked; shred meat. Food safety: chicken ~74°C.
Add rice and salt to broth; simmer 12–15 minutes.
Return shredded chicken and heat through.

recipes.title: Kelle Paça Soup (Kelle Paça Çorbası)
recipes.description: Rich gelatinous soup made from slow-cooked head/feet—traditional night soup.

instructions.text: Simmer cooked kelle-paça with water 2–3 hours for a rich broth.
Season with salt and optional garlic; serve hot.

recipes.title: Kalburabastı (Syrup Semolina Cookies)
recipes.description: Ridged semolina cookies soaked in syrup—classic Turkish dessert.

instructions.text: Syrup: simmer water + sugar + lemon juice 10 minutes; cool.
Dough: mix butter, semolina, flour, baking powder; shape ridged pieces, optional walnut inside.
Bake at 180°C for 20–25 minutes. Pour cool syrup over hot cookies; rest.

recipes.title: Künefe
recipes.description: Cheese-filled shredded pastry soaked with syrup—served warm.

instructions.text: Syrup: simmer water + sugar + lemon juice 10 minutes; keep warm.
Mix kadayif with melted butter. Layer half in pan, add cheese, cover with remaining kadayif.
Cook on stove or bake at 200°C until deeply golden (15–20 minutes).
Pour warm syrup over hot künefe; serve immediately.

recipes.title: Lokma (Fried Syrup Doughnuts)
recipes.description: Small fried dough balls soaked in syrup.

instructions.text: Syrup: simmer water_for_syrup + sugar + lemon juice 10 minutes; cool.
Batter: mix flour, water, yeast; rest 20 minutes.
Fry small spoonfuls in hot oil until golden; immediately soak in syrup.

recipes.title: Simit
recipes.description: Sesame-crusted Turkish bread rings.

instructions.text: Dough: mix flour, water, yeast, salt; knead 8 minutes; rest 30 minutes.
Shape rings. Mix molasses with water_for_molasses; dip rings, then coat in sesame.
Bake at 220°C for 16–18 minutes until deep golden.

recipes.title: Pişi (Fried Dough)
recipes.description: Soft fried dough pieces—popular at breakfast.

instructions.text: Mix flour, baking powder, salt, and yogurt into a soft dough; rest 10 minutes.
Roll and cut pieces; fry in hot oil until puffed and golden.

description.en: Slow-cooked wheat and chicken, beaten until creamy; a ceremonial classic.
description.tr: Buğday ve tavukla uzun pişen, dövülerek kıvam alan geleneksel yemek.

text.en: Simmer wheat with water until very soft (about 2 hours).
text.tr: Buğdayı suyla çok yumuşayana kadar pişir (yaklaşık 2 saat).

text.en: Add chicken; cook until done, shred. Food safety: chicken ~74°C.
text.tr: Tavuğu ekle, pişince didikle. Gıda güvenliği: tavuk ~74°C.

text.en: Beat/mash until creamy; season with salt and finish with optional butter.
text.tr: Dövüp/ezip kıvam ver; tuzla ve istersen tereyağıyla bitir.

description.en: Bulgur shell stuffed with spiced minced meat; Hatay-style.
description.tr: Bulgur dışı, kıymalı içle doldurulan Hatay usulü içli köfte.

text.en: Soak bulgur with warm water until pliable; knead into a dough with salt.
text.tr: Bulguru ılık suyla yumuşat; tuzla yoğurup hamur yap.

text.en: Cook filling: sauté onion, add mince and salt; cook through. Food safety: mince ~71°C.
text.tr: İç: soğanı çevir, kıyma ve tuzu ekleyip pişir. Gıda güvenliği: kıyma ~71°C.

text.en: Stuff and shape; bake or shallow-fry (optional oil) until browned.
text.tr: Doldurup şekil ver; fırında ya da (istersen yağda) kızartarak pişir.

description.en: Delicate blossoms stuffed with herby rice, cooked in olive oil.
description.tr: Kabak çiçeklerinin yeşillikli pirinçle doldurulup zeytinyağında piştiği Ege klasiği.

text.en: Sauté onion in olive oil; add rice, salt, and optional dill; stir 2 minutes.
text.tr: Soğanı zeytinyağında çevir; pirinç, tuz ve (istersen) dereotunu ekleyip 2 dk kavur.

text.en: Stuff blossoms gently, arrange in pot, add water.
text.tr: Çiçekleri nazikçe doldur, tencereye diz, su ekle.

text.en: Simmer covered 30–35 minutes; serve lukewarm.
text.tr: Kısık ateşte 30–35 dk pişir; ılık servis et.

description.en: Bread soaked with broth, topped with meat and yogurt.
description.tr: Et suyu ile ıslatılmış ekmek/pide üzerine et ve yoğurtla servis.

text.en: Simmer beef with water and salt until tender; reserve broth.
text.tr: Eti su ve tuzla yumuşayana kadar haşla; suyunu ayır.

text.en: Tear bread into a tray and soak with hot broth.
text.tr: Ekmekleri tepsiye doğra, sıcak et suyuyla ıslat.

text.en: Top with shredded meat and yogurt; serve.
text.tr: Üzerine didiklenmiş et ve yoğurt koyarak servis et.

description.en: Grilled meatballs served with broth-soaked bread.
description.tr: Et suyuna batırılmış ekmekle servis edilen köfte.

text.en: Season mince with salt, shape meatballs.
text.tr: Kıymayı tuzla yoğur, köfte şekli ver.

text.en: Grill/pan-sear until cooked. Food safety: mince ~71°C.
text.tr: Izgara/tavada pişir. Gıda güvenliği: kıyma ~71°C.

text.en: Warm water with optional butter as quick broth; dip bread and serve with meatballs.
text.tr: Suya (istersen) tereyağı ekleyip ısıt; ekmeği batırıp köfteyle servis et.

description.en: Black Sea style grilled meatballs, simple and juicy.
description.tr: Karadeniz usulü ızgara köfte.

text.en: Knead mince with salt and optional crumbs/water until sticky.
text.tr: Kıymayı tuz ve (istersen) ekmek içi/su ile iyice yoğur.

text.en: Shape and grill/pan-sear until cooked. Food safety: mince ~71°C.
text.tr: Şekil verip pişir. Gıda güvenliği: kıyma ~71°C.

description.en: Rice baked with anchovies, a Black Sea specialty.
description.tr: Hamsiyle fırınlanan pilav; Karadeniz yöresi.

text.en: Sauté onion in butter, add rice and salt; add water and cook 12 minutes, rest 10.
text.tr: Soğanı tereyağında çevir; pirinç ve tuzu ekle; suyu ekleyip 12 dk pişir, 10 dk dinlendir.

text.en: Line a baking dish with cleaned anchovies, add pilaf, cover with more anchovies.
text.tr: Tepsiyi temizlenmiş hamsiyle kapla, pilavı koy, üstünü tekrar hamsiyle ört.

text.en: Bake at 200°C for 20–25 minutes until anchovies are cooked.
text.tr: 200°C’de 20–25 dk pişir.

description.en: Cornmeal cooked with butter and melting cheese.
description.tr: Mısır unu, tereyağı ve uzayan peynirle yapılan Karadeniz lezzeti.

text.en: Melt butter, whisk in cornmeal, cook 1 minute.
text.tr: Tereyağını erit, mısır ununu ekleyip 1 dk çevir.

text.en: Add water and salt; simmer until thick.
text.tr: Su ve tuzu ekle; koyulaşana kadar pişir.

text.en: Add cheese; stir until melted and stretchy.
text.tr: Peyniri ekle; eriyip uzayana kadar karıştır.

description.en: Toasted noodles cooked like pilaf, often with butter.
description.tr: Kavrulan eriştenin pilav gibi pişirildiği pratik yemek.

text.en: Toast noodles in butter until lightly golden.
text.tr: Erişteyi tereyağında hafif kızarana kadar kavur.

text.en: Add water and salt; simmer until absorbed, then rest 10 minutes.
text.tr: Su ve tuzu ekle; suyunu çekene kadar pişir, 10 dk dinlendir.

description.en: Shredded chicken in walnut-garlic sauce, served cold.
description.tr: Didik tavuk, cevizli-sarımsaklı sosla soğuk servis edilen meze.

text.en: Boil chicken until cooked; shred. Food safety: chicken ~74°C.
text.tr: Tavuğu haşla, didikle. Gıda güvenliği: tavuk ~74°C.

text.en: Blend walnuts with salt and optional garlic (and optional crumbs) into a thick sauce.
text.tr: Cevizi tuz ve (istersen) sarımsakla (istersen ekmek içiyle) koyu sos yap.

text.en: Mix sauce with shredded chicken; chill and serve.
text.tr: Sosu tavukla karıştır; soğutup servis et.

description.en: Fried vegetables in garlicky tomato sauce, served as meze.
description.tr: Kızarmış sebzelerin sarımsaklı domates sosla servis edildiği meze.

text.en: Cube and fry eggplant and zucchini; drain and salt.
text.tr: Patlıcan ve kabağı küp doğrayıp kızart; süzüp tuzla.

text.en: Simmer tomatoes (and optional garlic) 10 minutes; pour over vegetables.
text.tr: Domatesi (istersen sarımsakla) 10 dk pişir; sebzelerin üstüne dök.

description.en: Meat stewed with quince for a sweet-savory balance.
description.tr: Ayva ile pişen et yemeği; ekşi-tatlı dengesi.

text.en: Simmer beef with onion, water, and salt 45 minutes.
text.tr: Eti soğan, su ve tuzla 45 dk pişir.

text.en: Add quince wedges; cook 25–30 minutes until tender.
text.tr: Ayvaları ekle; 25–30 dk yumuşayana kadar pişir.

description.en: Lamb baked in a tangy yogurt sauce.
description.tr: Yoğurtlu sosla fırınlanan kuzu yemeği.

text.en: Cook lamb with a little water and salt until nearly tender.
text.tr: Kuzu etini az su ve tuzla yumuşamaya yakın pişir.

text.en: Whisk yogurt with flour; pour over lamb in a baking dish, dot with butter.
text.tr: Yoğurt+unu çırp; fırın kabında etin üstüne dök, tereyağı parçaları koy.

text.en: Bake at 190°C for 25–30 minutes until set.
text.tr: 190°C’de 25–30 dk pişir.

description.en: Dried eggplants stuffed with rice and minced meat.
description.tr: Kuru patlıcanların pirinçli-kıymalı içle doldurulması.

text.en: Soften dried eggplants in hot water; drain.
text.tr: Kuru patlıcanları sıcak suda yumuşat, süz.

text.en: Mix rice, mince, onion, paste, salt; stuff eggplants.
text.tr: Pirinç, kıyma, soğan, salça, tuz karıştır; patlıcanları doldur.

text.en: Simmer in salted water 60–70 minutes. Food safety: mince ~71°C.
text.tr: Tuzlu suda 60–70 dk pişir. Gıda güvenliği: kıyma ~71°C.

description.en: Onion layers stuffed with rice and meat, gently simmered.
description.tr: Soğan katlarının pirinçli-kıymalı içle doldurulması.

text.en: Parboil onions, separate into layers.
text.tr: Soğanları hafif haşla, katlarına ayır.

text.en: Mix filling, stuff layers, arrange tightly.
text.tr: İçi karıştır, soğan katlarını doldur, tencereye sık diz.

text.en: Simmer with water and paste 55–60 minutes. Food safety: mince ~71°C.
text.tr: Su+salça ile 55–60 dk pişir. Gıda güvenliği: kıyma ~71°C.

description.en: Chard leaves rolled with herby rice (optionally with meat).
description.tr: Pazı yaprağına sarılan pirinçli iç; istersen kıymalı.

text.en: Blanch chard leaves briefly. Mix filling ingredients.
text.tr: Pazı yapraklarını kısa haşla. İç malzemeleri karıştır.

text.en: Roll, arrange, add water; simmer 50–55 minutes.
text.tr: Sar, diz, su ekle; 50–55 dk pişir.

description.en: Cauliflower florets battered and fried.
description.tr: Karnabaharın una/yumurtaya bulanıp kızartılması.

text.en: Parboil florets 4 minutes; drain.
text.tr: Çiçeklerini 4 dk haşla, süz.

text.en: Coat with flour, then egg; fry until golden; salt.
text.tr: Una, sonra yumurtaya bulayıp kızart; tuzla.

description.en: Aegean-style eggplant dish simmered with tomatoes and garlic.
description.tr: Domates ve sarımsakla pişen Ege usulü patlıcan yemeği.

text.en: Sauté eggplant in olive oil, add tomatoes and optional garlic.
text.tr: Patlıcanı zeytinyağında çevir; domates ve (istersen) sarımsağı ekle.

text.en: Add salt and optional water; simmer 25–30 minutes.
text.tr: Tuz ve (istersen) az su ekleyip 25–30 dk pişir.

description.en: Classic chickpea stew with tender meat.
description.tr: Nohut ve etin tencerede piştiği klasik yemek.

text.en: Soak chickpeas overnight; drain.
text.tr: Nohutu geceden ıslat, süz.

text.en: Simmer beef with onion, paste, water, salt; add chickpeas and cook until tender.
text.tr: Eti soğan-salça-su-tuzla pişir; nohutu ekleyip yumuşayana kadar pişir.

description.en: Light lamb stew with potatoes and carrots.
description.tr: Patates ve havuçla hafif kuzu haşlama.

text.en: Simmer lamb with water and salt 50 minutes.
text.tr: Kuzu etini su ve tuzla 50 dk pişir.

text.en: Add carrots and potatoes; cook 25–30 minutes until tender.
text.tr: Havuç ve patatesi ekle; 25–30 dk pişir.

description.en: Fish gently cooked with onions and tomatoes.
description.tr: Soğan ve domatesle kısık ateşte buğulama balık.

text.en: Layer onions and tomatoes in a pan, add fish on top; season.
text.tr: Tavaya soğan-domates diz, balığı üstüne koy; tuzla.

text.en: Add olive oil (and optional water), cover and simmer 20–25 minutes.
text.tr: Zeytinyağı (istersen su) ekle; kapaklı 20–25 dk pişir.

description.en: Bonito slices lightly floured and pan-fried.
description.tr: Palamut dilimlerinin una bulanıp kızartılması.

text.en: Salt fish, coat lightly with flour.
text.tr: Balığı tuzla, hafif una bul.

text.en: Pan-fry in hot oil until cooked through.
text.tr: Kızgın yağda iki yüzünü pişir.

description.en: Silky Aegean fava served with olive oil.
description.tr: Zeytinyağıyla servis edilen Ege usulü bakla ezmesi.

text.en: Simmer fava beans (and optional onion) with water until very soft.
text.tr: Favayı (istersen soğanla) suyla çok yumuşayana kadar pişir.

text.en: Blend with salt; pour into a dish, cool, drizzle olive oil.
text.tr: Tuzlayıp püre yap; kaba dök, soğut, zeytinyağı gezdir.

description.en: Spinach mixed with garlicky yogurt (optional).
description.tr: Ispanak ve yoğurdun buluştuğu borani; sarımsak isteğe bağlı.

text.en: Sauté/wilt spinach with a pinch of salt; cool.
text.tr: Ispanağı hafif tuzla söndür; soğut.

text.en: Mix yogurt with optional garlic and salt; fold in spinach, drizzle optional olive oil.
text.tr: Yoğurdu (istersen) sarımsak ve tuzla karıştır; ıspanağı ekle, istersen zeytinyağı gezdir.

description.en: Bulgur dumplings in tomato sauce.
description.tr: Bulgur köftelerinin salçalı-domatesli sosla servis edildiği yöresel lezzet.

text.en: Knead bulgur with a little warm water, flour, and salt; form small balls.
text.tr: Bulguru az ılık suyla, un ve tuzla yoğur; minik toplar yap.

text.en: Boil dumplings until they float. Simmer paste with water and olive oil for sauce.
text.tr: Köfteleri haşla. Salçayı su ve zeytinyağıyla sos yap.

text.en: Toss dumplings with sauce and serve.
text.tr: Köfteleri sosla buluşturup servis et.

description.en: Spiced mince pressed in a tray and baked with tomatoes/peppers.
description.tr: Kıymanın tepsiye bastırılıp domates-biberle fırınlandığı Hatay usulü.

text.en: Knead mince with grated onion and salt; press into an oiled tray.
text.tr: Kıymayı soğan rendesi ve tuzla yoğur; yağlanmış tepsiye bastır.

text.en: Top with sliced tomatoes and optional peppers; bake at 200°C for 22–25 minutes.
text.tr: Üstüne domates ve (istersen) biber diz; 200°C’de 22–25 dk pişir.

text.en: Food safety: mince should reach ~71°C.
text.tr: Gıda güvenliği: kıyma ~71°C.

description.en: Dried peppers stuffed with rice and meat, simmered.
description.tr: Kuru biberlerin içle doldurulup pişirilmesi.

text.en: Soften dried peppers in hot water; drain.
text.tr: Kuru biberleri sıcak suda yumuşat, süz.

text.en: Mix filling; stuff peppers and arrange tightly.
text.tr: İçi karıştır; biberleri doldurup sık diz.

text.en: Simmer with water and paste 60–70 minutes. Food safety: mince ~71°C.
text.tr: Su+salça ile 60–70 dk pişir. Gıda güvenliği: kıyma ~71°C.

description.en: Slow-cooked pumpkin with sugar, served with tahini.
description.tr: Şekerle pişen kabak tatlısı; tahinle servis.

text.en: Layer pumpkin with sugar; rest 30 minutes to release juice.
text.tr: Kabak ve şekeri kat kat diz; 30 dk sulanması için beklet.
